Posts.Content: Nov 17, 2011 12:45PM pcharlene wrote: This is good to know, am getting ready to go thru the BSGI tesing and was trying to find out more about it.  This has help a lot. I was really scared.  This will me my second time dealing with breast cancer and it is scary to find out i might have it again in my right breast.  I have a lot of calcifications in my right breast and there is a difference between my last mammogram.  I had a mastectomy in 2004 of my left breast.
Posts.Title: BSGI Testing and Calcifications 41jq pcharlene
